200 CLS:CLEAR:N2=0:SCREEN7,4,6:PRINT:INPUT"NOMBRES DE JOUEURS.4 MAXIMUM ";NJ:IFNJ<1ORNJ>4THEN200ELSELOCATE0,8:FORI=1TONJ:PRINT"NOM DU JOUEUR ";I;:INPUTN$:J$(I)=N$:PRINT:NEXTI
210 CLS:SCREEN0,3,1:LOCATE0,5:PRINT"Pour le tirage au sort des villes a     deviner; j'ai besoin d'un nombre de 2   chiffres.":LOCATE0,10,0:FOR I=1 TO NJ:PRINT"Donnez moi un nombre ";J$(1);:INPUTN1:N2=N2+N1:PRINT:NEXTI
220 LOCATE0,0,0:BOXF(0,0)-(13,23)" ",,4:BOXF(14,0)-(26,23)" ",,7:BOXF(27,0)-(39,23)" ",,1:BOX(0,0)-(318,191),0
300 READ X,Y,Z:IFX=0THENGOTO400ELSEBOXF(Y,X)-(Z,X),0:GOTO 300
400 CONSOLE24,24:SCREEN0,7,6:FORI=1TO10:FORJ=1TONJ:AJ$=J$(J):SCORE=PT(J):GOSUB1000:PT(J)=SCORE:NEXTJ:NEXTI
500 CONSOLE0,24:CLS:SCREEN0,1,2:PRINT"SCORE FINAL":PRINT"----------":LOCATE0,5,0:FORI=1TONJ:PRINTJ$(I),PT(I):PRINT:NEXT:INPUT"UN AUTRE JEU ";XX$:IFLEFT$(XX$,1)="0"THEN200ELSECLS:PRINT"AU REVOIR  ":END
1000 N2=INT(N2/NJ):HZ=INT(RND*90)+1:RESTORE20000
1010 IFN2<0ORN2>98THENN2=INT(RND*90)
1015 IF N2>HZ THEN OA=N2:N2=HZ:HZ=OA
1020 FORZ=N2 TOHZ-1:READV$,C,L:NEXTZ:BOXF(C,L)-(C,L+8),-2:BOXF(C,L)-(C,L+8),1
2000 LOCATE28,5:AJ$=AJ$+"         ":PRINTLEFT$(AJ$,9):LOCATE28,10:PRINT"TOUR :";I:LOCATE28,15:PRINT"SCORE:";SCORE
2040 IFK=1THENK=0:BOXF(C,L)-(C,L+8),-3:BOXF(C,L)-(C,L+8),2:RETURN
2060 LOCATE1,24:E=1:P=10:GOSUB 3000
2070 IFK=1THEN2000ELSEE=2:P=5:LOCATE1,24:PRINT"AIDE : ";LEFT$(V$,1);".";:GOSUB 3000
2080 IFK=1THEN2000ELSEE=3:P=2:LOCATE1,24:PRINT"AIDE : ";LEFT$(V$,2);".";:GOSUB 3000:IFK=1THEN2000
2100 LOCATE1,24:PRINT"REPONSE : ";V$;".";:PLAY"O3DODO":LINEINPUT "(entree)";XX$:BOXF(C,L)-(C,L+8),-6:BOXF(C,L)-(C,L+8),5:RETURN
3000 PRINT"ESSAI ";E;":";:PLAY"MI":LINE INPUT R$:IF R$=V$ THEN LOCATE1,24:PRINT"EXACT ! ";P;" POINTS ";:GOSUB30000:LINE INPUT"(entree)";XX$:SCORE=SCORE+P:K=1:RETURN
3010 RETURN
10000 DATA 1,118,120,2,112,120,3,110,121,4,108,121,5,108,121,6,108,121,7,108,123,7,127,128,8,107,123,8,126,128,9,107,130
10010 DATA 10,107,130,11,107,130,12,107,130,13,107,131,13,133,133,14,107,136,15,106,136,16,107,136,17,106,141,18,106,144,19,107,143,20,106,106,20,109,143,21,106,143,21,152,153,22,105,144,22,151,152,23,104,143,23,151,152,24,103,143,24,150,152,25,101,146
10020 DATA 25,149,152,26,97,153,27,92,153,28,91,153,28,155,155,29,57,58,29,90,155,30,58,59,30,63,66,30,88,157,31,58,66,31,87,159,32,58,65,32,87,161,33,58,65,33,86,161,33,166,168
10030 DATA 34,56,65,34,85,168,34,172,174,35,58,66,35,86,176,36,58,66,36,91,177,37,60,66,37,68,71,37,87,178,38,60,78,38,85,178,39,61,80,39,83,179
10040 DATA 40,61,179,40,182,183,41,61,185,41,190,191,42,61,191,43,61,199,44,61,202,45,62,202,46,36,39,46,62,201,47,32,39,47,62,201,48,32,40,48,61,200,49,18,20
10050 DATA 49,23,25,49,28,30,49,32,40,49,61,199,50,16,41,50,61,198,51,15,42,51,48,50,51,55,56,51,63,197
10060 DATA 52,14,42,52,47,56,52,60,61,52,64,196,53,14,43,53,46,196,54,14,196,55,14,16,55,18,196,56,20,196,57,15,15,57,22,196,58,16,196,59,16,16,59,20,195
10070 DATA 60,21,195,61,19,194,62,14,194,63,11,194,64,18,193,65,19,193,66,19,193,67,18,21,67,26,193,68,26,194,69,30,194,70,31,32,70,34,194,71,32,32,71,34,194,72,35,193,73,36,193,74,36,38,74,43,194,75,40,194,76,40,194,77,46,194,78,46,185,78,189,193
10080 DATA 79,45,185,80,45,187,81,45,81,81,51,187,82,51,186,83,51,186,84,49,185,85,50,184,86,53,183,87,53,182,88,52,182,89,52,180,90,50,179,91,50,179,92,51,179,93,52,179,94,52,178,95,53,177,96,54,176,97,54,175,98,55,174
10090 DATA 99,55,174,100,56,174,101,59,174,102,59,174,102,180,184,103,62,174,103,177,184,104,63,174,104,177,185,105,65,174,105,178,185,106,63,172,106,177,185,107,63,172,107,175,185,108,64,186,109,65,187,110,65,188,111,65,188,112,65,188
10100 DATA 113,65,187,114,64,185,115,62,185,116,63,183,117,63,186,118,64,188,119,66,188,120,64,64,120,67,188,121,64,64,121,67,188,122,64,65,122,68,190,123,64,66,123,69,191,124,64,67,124,70,190,125,64,68,125,70,190,126,63,68,126,71,190,127,63,69,127,71,190
10110 DATA 128,63,69,128,71,187,129,63,69,129,71,183,129,186,187,130,63,70,130,72,183,131,63,70,131,72,183,132,62,70,132,72,185,133,62,185,134,62,185,135,62,186,136,62,189,137,62,189,138,61,190,139,61,61,139,65,188,140,65,188,141,61,188,142,60,187
10120 DATA 143,60,187,144,60,188,145,61,188,146,61,188,147,61,189,148,60,191,149,60,193,149,198,200,150,60,201,151,60,201,152,60,201,153,60,201,154,59,200,155,59,199,156,59,199,157,59,199,158,58,199,159,58,198,160,58,196,161,57,195,162,57,194,163,57,193
10130 DATA 164,56,191,165,55,190,166,54,140,166,145,188,167,51,140,167,146,187,168,51,140,168,152,186,169,54,138,169,152,158,169,160,186,170,58,136,170,165,186,171,57,135,171,165,186,172,57,132,172,169,186,173,56,130,173,171,182
10140 DATA 174,56,57,174,59,129,174,173,178,175,61,129,175,173,178,176,63,128,177,68,127,178,68,127,179,69,128,180,70,128,181,70,70,181,76,128,182,77,90,182,96,128,183,78,90,183,97,128,184,83,90,184,101,128
10150 DATA 185,102,128,186,101,128,187,107,128,188,108,129,189,110,130,190,110,123,0,0,0
20000 DATA DUNKERQUE,115,1,LILLE,127,10,DIEPPE,99,24,AMIENS,116,26,REIMS,141,40,CHALONS-SUR-MARNE,141,41,AUXERRE,135,73,TROIS,141,61,BAR LE DUC,158,51,METZ,172,42,NANCY,172,51,COLMAR,190,64,STRASBOURG,196,52,MULHOUSE,192,72,DIJON,157,94,BESANCON,172,85
20010 DATA CHALON-SUR-SAONE,155,94,BOURG EN BRESSE,161,107,MONACO,199,160,NICE,196,162,CANNES,192,164,TOULON,174,175,MARSEILLE,167,170,AIX EN PROVENCE,165,165,GAP,174,142,BRIANCON,184,134,CHAMBERY,173,120,GRENOBLE,170,128,MEGEVE,183,113,ANNECY,175,112
20020 DATA ROANNE,144,110,LYON,155,117,VIENNE,156,121,VALENCE,156,134,SAINT ETIENNE,148,124,ORANGE,156,152,AVIGNON,156,156,NIMES,148,159,PARIS,117,49,MELUN,121,56,ALENCON,85,57,CAEN,79,41,CHERBOURG,61,28,DINAN,53,56,DEAUVILLE,85,37,LE HAVRE,84,33
20030 DATA ROUEN,100,37,EVREUX,100,45,VERSAILLES,112,50,FONTAINEBLEAU,122,59,BOURGES,118,88,SAINT NAZAIRE,49,81,LORIENT,30,71,QUIMPER,22,63,BREST,17,44,RENNES,59,63,SAINT MALO,56,51,LE MANS,86,67,CHARTRES,104,58,ORLEANS,111,70,MOULINS,132,100
20040 DATA VICHY,135,108,MONTLUCON,120,104,CHATEAUROUX,107,94,POITIERS,87,99,NIORT,74,103,LA ROCHE SUR YON,60,94,NANTES,59,83,ANGERS,73,78,TOURS,92,81,RODEZ,120,148,AURILLAC,118,135,BRIVES,104,130,PERIGEUX,89,129,LIMOGES,100,115,ANGOULEME,83,118
20050 DATA ROCHEFORT,66,111,LA ROCHELLE,64,107,ARCACHON,60,138,CLERMONT FERRAND,129,47,AGEN,90,150,MONTAUBAN,101,156,BORDEAUX,11,135,CAHORS,104,115,ALBI,114,157,CARCASSONNE,117,173,FOIX,105,168,PERPIGNAN,168,184,BEZIERS,131,170,MONTPELIER,141,165
20060 DATA BIARRITZ,54,163,BAYONNE,56,165,PAU,73,169
30000 PLAY"T4O4DODOPDOFAPFAPSOPSOPO5DOPO4LAFA":RETURN
